p: The study entry criteria were as follows: (a) 18 years of age or older, (b) spoke English, (c) born in Africa, (d) HIV-positive, (e) domiciliated in Minnesota, (f) prescribed ART treatment, and willing to share their experiences of being HIV-positive and receiving ART treatment. The exclusion criteria were as follows: (a) minors, (b) did not speak English, (c) were not born in Africa, and (d) were HIV positive, but did not take ART treatment at the time of the interview.
